utils.read_image(img_file, height=None)[source]¶

Return an image as numpy array for a image file using cv2

Parameters

  • img_file (path) – Image file path

  • height (int, optional) – Ouput height if desired, width is scaled without loss of resolution. Defaults to None.

Returns

Single image as numpy array

Return type

[numpy.array]

utils.resize_arr(img_inst, new_shape)[source]¶

Outputs resized image instance

Parameters

  • img_inst (np.array) – Input image instance

  • new_shape (tuple) – Output size (width, height)

Returns

Resized image

Return type

np.array
